Description:
stsw config for Stronghold Crusader 1.41 UCP
	
-General:
	-AI have doubled number of starting troops
	
-Caliph:
	-Normal troops changed from 6 ArabArcher, 3 ArabArcher, 3 FireThrower => 12 ArabArcher, 8 ArabSwordsman, 4 FireThrower
	-Crusade troops changed from 70 ArabArcher => 100 ArabArcher, 16 ArabSwordsman, 16 FireThrower
	-Deathmatch troops changed from 6 ArabArcher, 3 ArabArcher, 3 FireThrower => 12 ArabArcher, 8 ArabSwordsman, 4 FireThrower
	
-Sultan:
	-Crusade troops changed from 80 Slinger, 20 ArabSwordsman => 112 Slinger, 40 ArabSwordsman, 16 FireThrower
	
-Emir:
	-Normal troops changed from 10 HorseArcher, 2 ArabSwordsman => 8 EuropArcher, 8 ArabArcher, 8 ArabSwordsman
	-Crusade troops changed from 60 HorseArcher, 5 ArabSwordsman => 64 EuropArcher, 32 ArabArcher, 16 ArabSwordsman
	-Deathmatch troops changed from 10 HorseArcher, 2 ArabSwordsman => 8 EuropArcher, 8 ArabArcher, 8 ArabSwordsman
	
-Sheriff:
	-Normal troops changed from 6 Maceman, 4 Crossbowman, 2 FireThrower => 8 Crossbowman, 12 Pikeman, 4 FireThrower
	-Crusade troops changed from 30 Maceman, 30 Crossbowman, 10 FireThrower => 60 Crossbowman, 60 Pikeman, 20 FireThrower
	-Deathmatch troops changed from 6 Maceman, 4 Crossbowman, 2 FireThrower => 8 Crossbowman, 12 Pikeman, 4 FireThrower
	
-Abbot:
	-Crusade troops changed from 100 Monk => 80 EuropArcher, 48 Monk
	
-PlayerEurop:
	-Normal troops changed from 5 EuropArcher, 7 Spearman => 6 EuropArcher, 6 Spearman
	-Crusade troops changed from 40 EuropArcher, 10 Swordsman, 4 Knight => 30 EuropArcher, 3 Crossbowman, 12 Swordsman
	-Deathmatch troops changed from 5 EuropArcher, 7 Spearman => 6 EuropArcher, 6 Spearman
	
-PlayerArab:
	-Normal troops changed from 6 ArabArcher, 6 Slave => 5 ArabArcher, 7 Slave
	-Crusade troops changed from 50 ArabArcher, 10 ArabSwordsman => 25 ArabArcher, 15 ArabSwordsman, 3 FireThrower
	-Deathmatch troops changed from 6 ArabArcher, 6 Slave => 5 ArabArcher, 7 Slave
